column3: re still pretty good considering the pieces used. The stinger is a bit heavy but is a good counterweight for the claws(i think) witch i really like because they can open and close.

column2: m a bit mixed about the sabertooth. The legs are really greatly designed as well as the body but the tail is maybe a bit small? I really like the head design,&nbsp

column1: The dragon is the main build and rightfully so. the tail of the dragon has only one ball joint but is really movable because of its design. i really like the design

column3: middle. the legs are fairly standard but the feet(?) and claws can move with the help of a technic pin witch makes it more posable.&nbsp
column4: The dragon head is nicely designed. The treasure chest is good use of parts and you can even put treasure in it.
